q_en: What raw materials are used by Skilled Sewers?
gt:
Sure! Let's take a look at the raw materials used by the "Skilled Sewers" working group. Based on the data, here are the original materials involved in their tasks:

| Original Material ID | Material Name     |
|----------------------|-------------------|
| 1                    | Wool              |
| 3                    | Silk              |
| 5                    | Cotton Fabric     |
| 7                    | Denim Fabric      |
| 9                    | Down              |
| 11                   | Down Pieces       |
| 13                   | Synthetic Fiber   |
| 14                   | Leather           |

These materials are the building blocks for the products crafted by the talented "Skilled Sewers" team. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Skilled Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE working_group_id = '7';
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing task IDs associated with the working group "Skilled Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT order_product_id FROM sewing_tasks WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the order product IDs associated with the sewing tasks

steps.sql: SELECT product_id FROM order_product WHERE id IN (8, 17, 18, 19, 23, 27, 28, 29);
steps.description: Retrieve the product IDs associated with the order products

results.input:
Retrieve the work-in-progress material IDs for the products
["tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 2}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 6}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 7}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 8}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 9}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 10}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 14}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product", "tool_get_wip_materials, {'product_id': 23}, Get the required work-in-progress materials for a product"]

Retrieve the original materials for each work-in-progress material
['tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': 6}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material', 'tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': 4}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material', 'tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': 8}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material', 'tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': 12}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material', 'tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': 2}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material', 'tool_get_original_materials, {\'wip_id\': 10}, Get the original materials for a work-in-progress material']

steps.sql: SELECT name FROM materials WHERE id IN (5, 1, 3, 14, 13, 7, 9, 11);
steps.description: Retrieve the names of the original materials
